mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (title, introduction, content, cover_url, user_id, view_count, favorites_count, like_count, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{introduction}, #{content}, #{coverUrl}, #{userId}, #{viewCount}, #{favoritesCount}, #{likeCount}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title = #{title}, introduction = #{introduction}, content = #{content}, cover_url = #{coverUrl}, user_id = #{userId}, view_count = #{viewCount}, favorites_count = #{favoritesCount}, like_count = #{likeCount}, update_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}

mapper.select: SELECT id, title, introduction, content, cover_url, user_id, view_count, favorites_count, like_count, create_time, update_time FROM article WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT a.id AS article_id, a.title, a.introduction, a.content, a.cover_url, a.user_id, a.view_count, a.favorites_count, a.like_count, a.create_time, a.update_time, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t.name ORDER BY t.name SEPARATOR ', ') AS tags, u.nickname AS author_nickname, u.avatar AS author_avatar FROM article a LEFT JOIN article_tag at ON a.id = at.article_id LEFT JOIN tag t ON at.tag_id = t.id LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.create_time DESC;
